p: According to the requirements of prevention and control of healthcare-associated infections (HAIs), the layout of the ED was rearranged and divided into contaminated area, potentially contaminated area, and clean area. Each area was equipped with single rooms for isolation. Infusion chairs and hospital beds were separated, thereby reducing the personnel density. In addition, the emergency conference room was renovated (with treatment belts, etc.) as an expanded area in anticipation of a surge in patients under observation.
